title: Amazon and Udemy Scraper
snippet:
We are looking for an experienced PHP programmer to code a tool that can scrape books and courses listed on Udemy and Amazon.

Job requirements:

Search field to enter keywords/phrases/product name
Field to enter price range
Field to enter desired number of reviews (whichever number is entered, results should return at least that number)

Results should include a link to the product with the following:

Category the product comes under
Number of reviews (The number should be clickable and link to the reviews page of that product)
Price of the product
Sales rank on Amazon

Need to be able to sort by highest or lowest values for each column.

Option to export results to Excel.


I have attached a PDF showing an example of how I would like the results to be laid out.

Experience with PHP is essential. 

Examples of similar jobs carried out will also be required.
